Aeromagnetic Compensation¶

The following are key functions related to aeromagnetic compensation.

Tolles-Lawson¶

Model Training/Fitting¶

MagNavPy.src.compensation.comp_train(comp_params: CompParams, lines: int | float | List[int | float] | ndarray, df_line: Any, df_flight: Any, df_map: Any, temp_params: TempParams | None = None, silent: bool = False) → Tuple[CompParams, ndarray, ndarray, ndarray, List[str]][source]¶

Train an aeromagnetic compensation model using DataFrame inputs. This version loads XYZ data based on lines and DataFrames.

Model Testing¶

MagNavPy.src.compensation.comp_test(comp_params: CompParams, lines: int | float | List[int | float] | ndarray, df_line: Any, df_flight: Any, df_map: Any, temp_params: TempParams | None = None, silent: bool = False) → Tuple[ndarray, ndarray, ndarray, List[str]][source]¶

Evaluate performance of an aeromagnetic compensation model using DataFrame inputs.
